title: Channel emote error EM01 and EM05
body:
I keep getting an error EM01 and EM05 when I try to access emotes. It first shows me EM01 and then when I click ok it gives me the same message with EM05. 

I've logged out and back in several times and these error notifications continues to pop up. Can't use my emtoe :/

Any fix for this?

replies.body: bump same error for me

yes same here
even after settin the pages new and relog into client all are gone..at least the spot i have are still the same....btw nerf garen
Same here. Also all runepages are gone if I relog.
Same problem. Did all methods its from my account. Even the rune pages delete themselves. Ingame no sticker too. Pls fix rito  {{item:2033}}

Same problem EM01 EM05 error not able to open emote page. Runes also get cleared when i relogin.{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} 
Tried re-installing, Full client repair nothing works please help.
same error{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

RITO please help.. this isnt that  bad of an error but ive been losing my games lately beacuse i am lil bit angry bout this....joking of course its just me being bad at the game... i tried to run as administrator but that didnt help either . really hope that this gets fixed soon beacuse this has been going on for  a month {{champion:13}}

It just fixed magically for me, today! I really didn't do anything special, yesterday it was not working, neither emotes nor rune pages, and today I checked and my old rune pages were there and all my emotes again! yayy
I have the same probem.. still no answer for this?!.
WHAT I SHOULD DO I CAN'T LOGIN TO IMOTES
Same{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Hi, 
I had the same problem and what I did was go to the "riot games" folder
then "rad", "projects", "releases" and delete the folder with the highest number in my case 0.0.0.120 and reboot the computer, then I did something that I do not know if it was important and that it changed the region and returned to put in which was before loging. 
 
I hope it serves you.  
{{sticker:darius-angry}}
same problem
Same problem too
I have same problem too
**It happened to me today, how do you fix it??**
same problem with emotes and runns how can i fixed
Yep same problem , i get this EMO errors and cant use emotes at all , since emote update happend {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

I'm having the same issue, EM01 followed by EM05, and haven't been able to access my emotes since preseason.

If someone is able to log on with one account and access their emotes page, but then not be able to access their emotes page on the same computer, same client, but different account, then my assumption would be that it's related to one of the emotes that we have that is causing the issue, and other people who don't have it aren't having the issue. At least that would just be my assumption without actually being able to see who has what emotes, and whether or not they can access their emotes page.

On that note, I have all the emotes, and zero access to edit what emotes I have set.
{{sticker:sg-janna}}

Yep, same here. But mine's more of a random problem rather than a consistent one.
I was able to open the emotes tab in the beginning but I started getting the error since yesterday.
Same Problem here :/ since 1 week i think.

Hey,

Yes, I think this is also specific account based issue, as i have tried all possible repairs including a full re-install -_- and that didnt do not work.
I have the same problem :(

It seems like the main problem going on with these EM errors are some kind of hangup when the client is trying to pull your emote data from the servers. I've heard that typically refreshing your client works for some, but it sounds like we need to dig a little deeper here. 

Do me a favor and try running a quick repair, and if that doesn't help update your port forwarding and DNS settings using our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a guide. Let me know if either of those help so I can try to get to the bottom of this problem once and for all!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=RsHuA8aL,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-08T01:49:13.848+0000)
>
> It seems like the main problem going on with these EM errors are some kind of hangup when the client is trying to pull your emote data from the servers. I've heard that typically refreshing your client works for some, but it sounds like we need to dig a little deeper here. 
> 
> Do me a favor and try running a quick repair, and if that doesn't help update your port forwarding and DNS settings using our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a guide. Let me know if either of those help so I can try to get to the bottom of this problem once and for all!

I have changed these setting and still the same problem, both EM01 and EM05 occur.


I have also done the following, I used my wife's computer which she could go into her emotes tab but when it's on my own account, I can't access it.

Hopefully this help.
I have changed these setting and still the same problem, both EM01 and EM05 occur.
